title: Strengthening Systems Design Practical Competencies: CAPs-Based Job Training for Pre-Service Science Teachers' Competency Development

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Science Education Theories and Practical Experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more science education strategies for students with special needs using CAPs content
Learners can complete a lesson design project by applying theories acquired through CAPs in a VR simulation environment
Learners can adapt CAPs learning content to real classroom contexts through peer assessment and self-reflection
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
